pullRequest.body:
* generalize and rename `MeasureTheory.snorm_indicator_ge_of_bdd_below`
* From the Sobolev inequality project

Co-authored-by: Heather Macbeth 25316162+hrmacbeth@users.noreply.github.com

---

GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

#### Import changes

Dependency changes

| File | Base Count | Head Count | Change |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Mathlib.MeasureTheory.Function.LpSeminorm.Basic | 1355 | 1354 | -1 (-0.07%) |

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ HasCompactSupport.abs`
`+ HasCompactSupport.fderiv_apply`
`+ Pi.nnnorm_single`
`+ Pi.norm_single`
`+ _root_.Continuous.memℒp_of_hasCompactSupport`
`+ _root_.HasCompactSupport.memℒp_of_bound`
`+ _root_.HasCompactSupport.rpow_const`
`+ closedEmbedding_update`
`+ div_le_iff`
`+ div_le_iff'`
`+ forall_and_left`
`+ forall_and_right`
`+ inv_mul_le_iff`
`+ le_snorm_of_bddBelow`
`+ mul_inv_le_iff`
`+ snorm_nnreal_eq_lintegral`
`+ snorm_nnreal_eq_snorm'`
`+ snorm_nnreal_pow_eq_lintegral`
`+ update_image`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/no_lost_declarations.sh short <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:

```
</details>

</details>

Pull request successfully merged into master.

  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9686831613/job/26730133174)
Could you move the assumption `[OpensMeasurableSpace X]` to the theorem that needs it, i.e., the second one.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: lemmas needed for Sobolev inequality
